hero.title: Umphakathi waseMbonambi
hero.subtitle: Abalindi Bomhlaba Wethu, Ozakwethu Ekuthuthukiseni
hero.description: Kusukela ezikhathini zasemandulo zobuciko bezandla kuya emzamweni wanamuhla, abantu baseMbonambi baqhubekisela phambili ifa labo lobuciko, ubunye, nokumelana nezimo.

transparency.title: Ingosi Yobumfihlo
transparency.subtitle: Ukufinyelela okuvulekile emibhalweni yezimali nokuphathwa kweMbonambi Trust. Sikholelwa ekusetshenzisweni okusobala emphakathini wethu.
transparency.error: Kuhlulekile ukulayisha amadokhumenti. Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi iseva isebenza.

tenders.title: Ukuthenga Namathenda
tenders.subtitle: Amathuba ebhizinisi yamanje nemiklomelo yezinkontileka kusuka eMbonambi Community Trust

error.title: Ayikwazanga Ukulayisha Amathenda
error.message: Kube nephutha lokuqondisana neseva. Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi iseva isebenza.

emptyState.title: Awekho Amathenda Atholakalayo
emptyState.open: Ayikho manje amathuba ethenda elivulekile. Sicela ubuye uhlole kamuva.

programmes.title: Izinhlelo Zokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi
programmes.subtitle: Ukuqinisa umphakathi waseMbonambi ngemfundo, ibhizinisi, nokusekela inhlalakahle

education.title: Imfundo Nokuthuthukiswa Kwamakhono
education.description: Ukusekela intsha yethu ngezifundo zemfundo ephakeme, ukuqeqeshwa kwemisebenzi, nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono ukwakha umphakathi onolwazi.

agriculture.title: Ibhizinisi Nezolimo
agriculture.description: Ukuqinisa abalimi bendawo nosomabhizinisi ngokusekela ezolimo, izinsiza zezolimo, kanye nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwe-SMME ukukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho.

welfare.title: Inhlalakahle Yomphakathi
welfare.description: Ukuhlinzeka ngezinhlelo zokusekela umphakathi, izinhlelo zokuvikelwa kokudla, nezinsizakalo zokunakekelwa komphakathi ukuqinisekisa inhlalakahle yawo wonke amahlali aseMbonambi.

infrastructure.title: Ingqalasizinda Nezindlu
infrastructure.description: Ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yomphakathi, amaphrojekthi ezindlu, nezikhungo zomphakathi ukuthuthukisa izimo zokuphila nokudala izindawo eziqhubekayo.

sports.title: Ezemidlalo Namasiko
sports.description: Ukugubha ifa lethu ngemicimbi yamasiko, izinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwezemidlalo, nezinhlelo zokubandakanya intsha ezigcina ubunikazi bethu.

programmes.emptyStateSubtext: Sicela ubuye uhlole kamuva ukuze uthole izibuyekezo.
